newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Four die in plane crash at Czech airshow -agency.
newsitem.headline: Four die in plane crash at Czech airshow -agency.

text.p: PRAGUE, MAY 31 (REUTER) - Four people were killed on Saturday when a light plane crashed at an airshow in Brno, 200 km (120 miles) south-east of Prague, Czech news agency CTK reported.
CTK, quoting a flying club official, said the pilot of the plane died along with his passengers, an elderly man and his two grandsons aged 10 and 12.
Nobody else was on board the plane, a Cessna-172, which crashed shortly after taking off.
